name: Email Sequence Creation
description: Design and write automated email sequences for nurturing leads, onboarding customers, or re-engaging inactive users. Includes sequence strategy, email copy, subject lines, and timing optimization.

currentProcess.description: Define sequence goals and audience segment
Map the sequence journey and email count
painPoints: How many emails is too many?

currentProcess.description: Write email copy for each email
Create subject lines and preview text

aiProcess.description: Define sequence strategy and journey map
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Sequence map with email count, timing, and goals per email
tips: Define the desired end action clearly
Provide context on where leads are coming from

aiProcess.description: Generate email copy for all emails
aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes persuasive email copy quickly
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Complete copy for all emails in sequence
tips: Provide brand voice and tone guidelines

aiProcess.description: Create subject line and preview text variations
aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT generates creative subject line options
aiProcess.expectedOutput: 3-5 subject line options per email with preview text
tips: Ask for different angles: curiosity, benefit, urgency, social proof

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude provides editorial feedback on persuasion and clarity
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Refined email copy ready for implementation
tips: Ask for feedback on CTA clarity and urgency
Check for consistency across the sequence

aiProcess.toolRationale: Manual platform work; AI can help with QA checklist

whyItMatters: Email sequences are the workhorse of marketing automation. They nurture leads while you sleep, convert at scale, and build relationships over time. Good sequences can 2-3x conversion rates compared to single emails.
commonMistakes: Too many emails too fast - respect inbox attention
No clear value in each email - every email should stand alone
Weak subject lines - if they don't open, the content doesn't matter
Generic CTAs - be specific about the next step
No personalization - use merge fields and segmentation
tips: Use AI to generate the full sequence at once - maintains narrative thread
Generate 5+ subject lines per email and A/B test the best
Ask AI to write emails that 'build on the previous email's value'
Include a plain-text version - some audiences prefer it
